msContents.summary: This manuscript consists two texts. At the beginning Prāyaścittaprakaraṇa from the Karmavipākam and then Manusmṛti. Some diseases and remedies to cure them are also discussed in the Karmavipākam. Only 11 chapters of the Manusmṛti are covered here. The published critical edition of Manusmṛti contains 12 chapters.

Left margin is written Karmmavipākam | on folio 1r.
On 45r in the left margin is written hariḥ om.
